wordpressPost.title: December Newsletter
wordpressPost.content:
Hi Stryde! We hope you had a happy and healthy Thanksgiving!

This holiday season we have a lot to be grateful for here at Stryde and one the many things is having such an amazing community made up of incredible riders and inspiring instructors. To show our gratitude, we want to continue to bring the joy of Stryde into your homes, or the homes of family and friends. Now through the end of the year, we are offering $200 off your Stryde bike purchase and free shipping! Our current delivery time is approximately 3 weeks, so go on and get yours today!

PICTURE IN PICTURE BETA

The new picture in picture beta feature will officially be rolling out on all Stryde bike tablets this month! What does that mean for you? You can now see your metrics while using another app in full view!

RIDE WITH PRIME CYCLE

If you haven’t already taken a Prime Cycle class on the app, you should! They joined the Stryde family last month and bring full-body, cycling workouts that are choreographed rhythm riding. Their dedicated and experienced team will help PUSH you to your limits and work you to the core. Check them out on the app today!

UPCOMING CLASSES TO BE ON THE LOOKOUT FOR

20 Min. Latin Ride w/ Julie Insogna-Jarrett

20 Min. Tailgate Ride w/ Allissa Benson

20 Min. Express Ride w/ Fred Smith

30 Min. 90’s Beginner Ride w/ Lindsay Gunderson

30 Min. 2000’s Flashback Ride w/ Ali Foglia

45 Min. Who Run the World Ride (All Female Artists) w/ Fred Smith

45 Min. Taylor Swift Vs. Her Exes w/ Will Hemond

45 Min. 70’s Ride w/ Patrick McGrath

45 Min. Christmas Came Early w/ Danielle Fucci

45 Min. Holiday Ride w/ Will Hemond
